  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:uciteljska/111907</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:uciteljska/111907</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Razumevanje branja - zgodbe od A do H</string>
            <string language="en">Reading comprehension - stories from A to H</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leseerfassen - Geschichten von A zu H</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Compréhension de lecture - histoires de A à H</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Compreensão da leitura - histórias de A a H</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Comprensione della lettura - storia da A alla H</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κατανόηση ανάγνωσης - ιστορίες από το Α στο χ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Comprensión de la lectura - historias de A a H</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Kratke zgodbice iz knjige Na vrtiljaku črk so se spremenile v učne liste za razumevanje branja. Temeljijo na vprašanjih iz NPZ-ja (sicer včasih za prvo triado), vendar se jih da uporabiti tudi pri samem pouku slovenščine kot miselna naloga za konec pouka ali sam začetek. Od otrok zahteva kar nekaj miselnega napora, vendar so mi na ta vprašanja odgovarjali tudi tisti učenci, ki so sicer imeli težave pri slovenščini. Vsi otroci so začeli razmišljati malo drugače. Vedeli so, da je v zgodbici \"trd oreh\", ki ga morajo razbiti z \"možgančkanjem\".</string>
            <string language="en">Short stories from the book \"Na vrtiljaku črk\" that can be used to improve reading comprehension.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">razumevanje</string>
            <string language="en">comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">branje</string>
            <string language="en">reading</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">zgodba</string>
            <string language="en">story</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vom Buch \"Na vrtiljaku?rk \", dem kurze 
Geschichten benutzt werden kann, um Leseerfassen zu verbessern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Histoires courtes du ?rk \ de "qui de vrtiljaku 
de \"Na de livre peut être employé pour améliorer la compréhension
de lecture.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Histórias curtas do?rk \ de "que do vrtiljaku do
\"Na do livro pode ser usado melhorar a compreensão da leitura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Storia corte dal?rk \ "da che di vrtiljaku di 
\"Na del libro può essere usato per migliorare la comprensione della 
lettura.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύντομες ιστορίες από το vrtiljaku ?rk \ 
βιβλίων \"Na" που μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί για να βελτιώσει την
κατανόηση ανάγνωσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Historias cortas del?rk \ de "el cual del 
vrtiljaku del \"Na del libro se puede utilizar para mejorar la 
comprensión de la lectura.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Messwert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lecture</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">história</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">storia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατανόηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ανάγνωση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">historia</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
